description:
11.282 vstack
Stack input videos vertically.

All streams must be of same pixel format and of same width.

Note that this filter is faster than using overlay and pad filter
to create same output.

The filter accepts the following options:
name: vstack

options.description: Set number of input streams. Default is 2.
options.name: inputs

options.description: If set to 1, force the output to terminate when the shortest input terminates. Default value is 0.
options.name: shortest
